text: DK: Jungle Climber, known as Donkey Kong: Jungle Climber in Japan and Europe, is a puzzle video game in the Donkey Kong series. It was released for the Nintendo DS in 2007. It is a sequel to the 2005 Game Boy Advance game DK: King of Swing.
